DOC.brief_summary: The prevalence overweight lifestyle relate disease cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) type 2 diabetes ( T2D ) increase world wide . The metabolic syndrome ( MeS ) condition characterize abdominal obesity , high blood lipid , high blood pressure elevate blood sugar . MeS associate increase risk develop CVD T2D . Dietary fiber whey protein independently show beneficial effect several risk factor previous study . Whey protein furthermore see show positive effect bone turnover . The purpose trial investigate whether increased intake dietary fiber whey protein ( separately combine ) period 12 week affect risk marker MeS bone turnover abdominally obese subject . A total 80 people abdominal obesity include . The design randomize , double blind , control dietary intervention trial . Subjects assign one four experimental group . Each group provide test product contain either high low whey protein high low dietary fiber replace part regular diet . The subject instruct incorporate test product habitual diet order maintain weight stability . The primary outcome postprandial lipaemia ( PPL ) - independent risk factor develop CVD . PPL estimate perform standardize high fat meal test postprandial level triglyceride measure . The author hypothesize diet high content whey protein high dietary fiber 12 week induce reduction PPL .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Whey Protein Dietary Fibers Risk Markers Metabolic Syndrome Bone Health
DOC.criteria: Waist circumference ≥ 80 cm ( woman ) /94 cm ( men ) Age ≥40 year Significant cardiovascular , renal endocrine disease History diabetes ≥ 3 kg weight gain loss within last 3 month Any change medication within last month Treatment steroid Pregnancy , breastfeed plan pregnancy Psychiatric history Alcohol drug addiction Dietary fiber supplement within last month
